post.summary: Create a new account given user information

email.description: Valid email address of the user who wants to register to the network

400.description: Registration failed due to existing username or email

post.summary: Return a JWT in exchange for username, password, & role

role.description:
Account role, depends on where to auth from:
 * `sensor`  - when authenticating from rshake device
 * `citizen` - when authenticating from webapp frontend
 * `admin`   - when authenticating from webapp admin-frontend
 * `brgy`    - when authenticating from ringserver

200.description: Authentication successful. ! Varies depending on account role !

accessToken.description:
JWT for auth user, this is either in payload/cookie depending on role
 * `sensor`  - returned in JSON response
 * `citizen` - returned in cookie
 * `admin`   - returned in cookie
 * `brgy`    - returned in JSON response

Set-Cookie.description: If role is citizen or admin, JWT is returned as cookie

400.description: Authentication failed due to various reasons

401.description: Authentication failed due to wrong password

Set-Cookie.description: This endpoints clears the accessToken cookie

403.description: When no token is present in sent cookie

get.summary: SSE endpoint to stream SC_PICK or SC_EVENT messages to the client.
get.description:
- This endpoint streams events to the client using Server-Sent Events (SSE).
- The endpoint uses the `text/event-stream` content type.
- Events are sent as STRINGS in the format: `event: <event_name>\ndata: <event_obj>\\id: <timestamp>\n\n`.
- `event` can be either SC_PICK or SC_EVENT

schema.description: The SSE data stream. Note that 'place' attribute can be Unavailable if geoserve api isn't online.
